name: Butterfly Effect (Zwinzler Games)
description:
Butterfly Effect

(def.)  In chaos theory, the butterfly effect is the sensitive dependence on initial conditions in which a small change in one state of a deterministic nonlinear system can result in large differences in a later state.

// This game is currently IN DEVELOPMENT

// current release: v0 

- Title screen complete

- Initial animation in game; initial text transition in place

This game is being developed as a part of the Indiecade "Jamming the Curve" 2020 Game Jam. The final game will be released by Oct. 1st, 2020.
